content.text:
[Verse]
[ch]E[/ch]
I should have stayed at home
[ch]E7[/ch]                                                               [ch]A[/ch]
'Cause right now I see all these people that love me but I still feel alone
               [ch]A6[/ch]       [ch]B[/ch]
Can't help but check my phone
[ch]E[/ch]
I could have made you mine
          [ch]E7[/ch]                                                               [ch]A[/ch]
But no it wasn't meant to be and see I wasn't made for you and you weren't made for me
          [ch]A6[/ch]        [ch]B[/ch]
Though it seemed so easy...

[Verse]
                   [ch]E[/ch]                         [ch]G#[/ch]
And that's because I wanna be your favourite boy
               [ch]A[/ch]
I wanna be the one that makes your day
                  [ch]Am[/ch]
The one you think about as you lie awake
[ch]E[/ch]                              [ch]G#[/ch]
I can't wait to be your number one
                     [ch]A[/ch]
I'll be your biggest fan and you'll be mine
                        [ch]Am[/ch]
But I still wanna break your heart and make you cry...

[Verse]
              [ch]E[/ch]
But won't you wait
              [ch]E7[/ch]
You know it's too late
          [ch]A[/ch]
I'm on my own shit now
       [ch]Am[/ch]                                  [ch]E[/ch]
Let me tell you how it feels to be fucking great
  [ch]E7[/ch]          [ch]A[/ch]
I feel great
   [ch]Am[/ch]
Woah oh oh oh oh
            [ch]E[/ch]
You need to be yourself
       [ch]E7[/ch]                                                                  [ch]A[/ch]
Love someone for loving you instead of someone really cool that makes your heart melt
                [ch]A6[/ch]       [ch]B[/ch]
Who knows what you truly felt
                [ch]E[/ch]
You're still my favourite girl
           [ch]E7[/ch]                                                                 [ch]A[/ch]
You better trust me when I tell you there ain't no one else more beautiful in this damn world
   [ch]A6[/ch]        [ch]B[/ch]
In this damn world...

[Chorus]
[ch]E[/ch]
You're gonna wanna be my best friend baby
[ch]E7[/ch]                               [ch]A[/ch]        [ch]Am[/ch]
You're gonna wanna be my best friend
(I said that)
[ch]E[/ch]
You're gonna wanna be my best friend baby
[ch]E7[/ch]                               [ch]A[/ch]        [ch]Am[/ch]
You're gonna wanna be my best friend
[ch]E[/ch]                               
You're gonna wanna be my best friend baby
[ch]E7[/ch]                               [ch]A[/ch]        [ch]Am[/ch]
You're gonna wanna be my best friend
(Best friend)
[ch]E[/ch]
You're gonna wanna be my best friend baby
[ch]E7[/ch]                               [ch]A[/ch]        [ch]Am[/ch]
You're gonna wanna be my best friend...
[ch]Am[/ch]
I say that I'm happy
[ch]Am[/ch]
I say that I'm happy
      [ch]Am[/ch]
But I know, know, know, know
[ch]Am[/ch]                             [ch]E[/ch]*
Know, know, know, oh...

[Verse]
                                [ch]G#[/ch]
I still wanna be your favourite boy
               [ch]A[/ch]
I wanna be the one that makes your day
                  [ch]A6[/ch]               [ch]B[/ch]
The one you think about as you lie awake
    [ch]E[/ch]                               [ch]G#[/ch]
And I can't wait to be your number - your number one
                     [ch]A[/ch]
I'll be your biggest fan and you'll be mine
                             [ch]Am[/ch]
But I still wanna break your heart and make you cry...

[Interlude]

content.text:
[Intro]
[ch]Ab[/ch]         [ch]Db[/ch]
Woah, oh
          [ch]Gb[/ch]
I want to know
            [ch]Ab[/ch]
Where I can go
                [ch]Ebm[/ch]
When you're not around
                [ch]Ab[/ch]
And I'm feeling down
   [ch]Bb[/ch]        [ch]B[/ch]
So won't you stay for a moment ?
         [ch]B[/ch]
So I can say
[ch]Ebm[/ch]         [ch]Db[/ch]                   [ch]Gb[/ch]
I,                     I need you so
                    [ch]Ab[/ch]                    [ch]B[/ch]
Cause right now you know, that nothing is new
                      [ch]Bbm[/ch]
And I'm obsessed with you
       [ch]Db[/ch]
Then I fell to the ground
And she smiled at me and said

[Verse]
                      [ch]Gb[/ch]
I don't wanna see you crying
                  [ch]Gbm[/ch]           [ch]Db[/ch]
You don't have to feel this emptiness
           [ch]Abm[/ch]                          [ch]Ebm[/ch]
She said I love you till the day that I die
            [ch]Gb[/ch]
Maybe she's right
                    [ch]Gbm[/ch]               [ch]Db[/ch]
Cause I don't wanna feel like I'm not me
          [ch]Abm[/ch]                      [ch]Ebm[/ch]
And to be honest I don't even know why
                              [ch]Gb[/ch]
I let myself get down in the first place

[Chorus]
              [ch]Ebm[/ch]             [ch]Db[/ch]
I'm trying to keep my mind at bay
   [ch]Abm[/ch]                    [ch]Ebm[/ch]
Sunflowers still grows at night
                                                    [ch]Gb[/ch]
Waiting for a minute till the sun's seen through my eyes
[ch]Ebm[/ch]                      [ch]Db[/ch]
Make it down down, do-down, down
        [ch]Abm[/ch]           [ch]Ebm[/ch]
Make it do-down, du du du
[ch]Ebm[/ch]                                                 [ch]Gb[/ch]

content.text:
Song: With or without you - Acoustic
Artist: U2
Composers: U2
Album: The Joshua tree
Tabbed by DJ
7th Aug 2015

An interesting way to get lots of open strings ringing on an acoustic guitar
and still maintain that bass progression. The chords can either be strummed or picked.
From Verse 3 onwards, if you have another guitarist the riff on the G5 could be added.

OPEN TUNING: D-A-D-A-A-D

Tune bottom E string down to D
Tune G string up to A (Take care tuning up,old strings might not take it too well)
Tune B string down to A
Tune top E string down to D

A chromatic tuner can be helpful to check the notes.

PLEASE IGNORE ANY POP-UP CHORD BOXES that the website might suggest,
and use the chord shapes shown below: 

[ch]D5[/ch]    = 050000
[ch]Asus4[/ch] = x02000
[ch]Bm7[/ch]   = x24000
[ch]Gsus2[/ch] = 555000

G5 = x x x 10 10 12


If, like me, you find the original key is still too high to sing the very
high notes, drop the tuning down another whole tone to C-G-C-G-G-C. The chord
shapes are exactly the same, but will sound as C5 - Gsus4 - Am7 - Fsus2,
and as an F5 for that high riff chord.
You will need to take more care not to play too heavily, particularly on the
bottom string, as they are a lot slacker, and it may need a bit more fine tuning
more often to keep all the strings in pitch.
N.B. 
I wouldn't recommend the lower tuning if you're using very light gauge strings.

================================================================================
